front.title: IEEE Standard for Wearable, Cuffless Blood Pressure Measuring Devices - Amendment 1

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Clarifying and furthering the subject selection of the sample size in the clinical study; looking into the results of the validation study with respect to the patient's body position and activity level for their applicability to ambulatory patients; and addressing the issues of motion artifact is covered in the amendment.
